Borderline Personality Disorder, or BPD, is a serious psychiatric disorder characterized by unstable relationships, emotional instability, and impulsivity. If you're seeking resources to better understand and support someone with BPD, some excellent sources include:



*   The National Institute of Mental Health (<https://www.nimh.nih.gov/>)
*   The National Alliance on Mental Illness (<https://www.nami.org/>)
*   The Borderline Personality Disorder Resource Center (<http://bpdresourcecenter.org/>)
